name: poke-flute
effect: Wakes up sleeping Pokémon. Required to wake up sleeping snorlax on the overworld.
short_effect: Use to awaken sleeping Pokémon, including Snorlax on roads.

flavor_text.emerald: A sweet-sounding flute that awakens POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A flute that is said to instantly awaken any POKéMON. It has a lovely tone.
